// PURPOSE: Coordinate Claude Code hooks with project's Husky hooks
// WORKFLOW: Claude's PreToolUse hooks can trigger Husky-like checks
Prevents Claude from committing if Husky checks would fail

PreToolUse.// DESCRIPTION: Run Husky pre-commit checks before Claude commits

hooks.command: if [ -f .husky/commit-msg ]; then echo 'Husky commit-msg will run on actual commit'; fi

// TIPS: If Husky hooks fail, Claude's commit will be blocked
Ensure lint-staged is configured to avoid formatting conflicts
Use 'git commit --no-verify' to skip hooks (not recommended)
